official_title: Develop a Pictographic Educational Handouts and Validate Its Preliminary Efficacy on Tracheostomy Care
inclusion_criteria:
* 18 years of age or older
* Had a tracheostomy as part of head and neck cancer treatment, and who is not on mechanical ventilation
* His or her date of the related tracheostomy surgery was within the past 6 months
* Have received the discharge tracheostomy care education from the clinical nurse
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Documented major physical or cognitive disabilities that would limit the ability to give informed consent or answer survey questions
